Articles.Content: I have a rocket that I want to upload so the world can download it, but I don't know any websites that let you do this.
What kind of file is it? is it a .CAD so people can 3D print it?

Or Dropbox, or Curse.

There are many useful sites.
KerbalX.com ++ for craft sharing, automagic mod detection is a wonderful thing.
Pastebin works in the short term. If you already have a gmail account, Google Drive. For complete overkill, github.
